007package violajones_utils;
008
009import ij.IJ;
010import ij.ImagePlus;
011import ij.ImageStack;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.ij.GuiTools;
015import imagingbook.core.jdoc.JavaDocHelp;
016import imagingbook.violajones.data.HaarTrainingSet;
017import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FeatureNode;
018import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FeaturePatch;
019import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FeatureTree;
020import imagingbook.violajones.lib.HaarCascadeDescriptor;
021import imagingbook.violajones.lib.Stage;
022
023import java.awt.Color;
024import java.io.InputStream;
025import java.util.List;
026
027/**
028 * ImageJ plugin. Visualizes the evaluation sequence for the selected Haar cascade. The current image is scaled to the
029 * size of the cascade (typ. 32x32) and shown in the background. The result is an image stack, with one slice for
030 * classifier each decision step. Feature support regions are shown as drawn into the image (to allow saving as a video).
031 *
032 * @author WB
033 */
034public class Visualize_Haar_Cascade_Paint implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp {
035        
036        static HaarTrainingSet desc = HaarTrainingSet.FrontalFaceAlt2;
037
038        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
039                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
040        }
041
042        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
043        
044                InputStream strm = desc.getStream();
045                if (strm == null) {
046                        IJ.log("could not open training set");
047                        return;
048                }
049                
050                HaarCascadeDescriptor cascade = HaarCascadeDescriptor.fromInputStream(strm);
051                
052                int w = cascade.getWidth();
053                int h = cascade.getHeight();
054                
055                List<Stage> stages = cascade.getStages();
056                
057                // create and populate the stack
058                ImageStack stack = new ImageStack(w, h);
059                ImageProcessor sp1 = ip.resize(w, h);
060                
061                int stageCtr = 0;
062                for (Stage stage : stages) {
063                        int treeCtr = 0;
064                        for (FeatureTree tree : stage.getTrees()) {
065                                int featureCtr = 0;
066                                for (FeatureNode feature : tree.getFeatures()) {
067                                        ImageProcessor sp = sp1.duplicate();
068                                        for (FeaturePatch r : feature.getPatches()) {
069                                                Color col = (r.weight > 0) ? Color.green : Color.red;
070                                                sp.setColor(col);
071                                                sp.fillRect(r.x, r.y, r.width, r.height);
072                                        }
073                                        stack.addSlice("Stage=" + stageCtr + " Tree=" + treeCtr + " Feat=" + featureCtr, sp);
074                                        featureCtr++;
075                                }
076                                treeCtr++;
077                        }
078                        stageCtr++;
079                }
080                
081                ImagePlus stackim = new ImagePlus("Cascade", stack);
082                stackim.show();
083                GuiTools.zoomExact(stackim, 10);
084                
085        }
086

090//                      rectRois.add(new Roi(r.x, r.y, r.width, r.height));
091//              }

115}
